mapper.select:
SELECT S.NO,S.NAME,NIGHT_PRICE,DAYTIME_PRICE,MAX_GUEST,STANDARD_GUEST,ADDRESS,SA.FILE_PATH FROM SPACE S JOIN SPACE_ATTACHMENT SA ON (S.NO = SA.SPACE_NO) WHERE STATUS_NO = '2' AND SA.THUMBNAIL = 'Y'
AND S.ADDRESS LIKE CONCAT(#{area}, '%')
AND S.MAX_GUEST > #{people}
AND S.NO NOT IN( SELECT SPACE_NO FROM SPACE_RESERVATION WHERE USE_DAY = #{date} AND PACKAGE_NO IN (1, 2) GROUP BY SPACE_NO HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT PACKAGE_NO) = 2)
AND S.NAME LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
